questions.text: What show was Woody cast in?
questions.explanation:
"Hair".

questions.explanation:
Lilith.

questions.text: How much money did Carla get as Eddie's beneficiary?
questions.explanation:
$50,000.

	Carla was not expecting anything so when she found out she got that much she was ecstatic. The others reminded her that she promised to give half to Gloria, but she got them to keep their mouths shut by buying them all free beers.

options: "Oh buy me a beer, or I"ll shed a tear."

questions.text: Did Carla give Gloria her half of the money in the end?

yes.
